doc.field: The Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
creation: circa 1802; alteration: circa 1900; alteration: 1920s; alteration: 1933; alteration: 1946
Poplar Forest--Was a Tavern--John Watson Home--Tandy Wilhoit Home--Richard Holladay Home--Short Home--V-Notch 1 Story Log Outbuilding from W VA 1851--Graining and Floor Painting, 20th century

Originally 2 Story Frame Hall-Parlor or 1 Story Frame 1 Cell, 70' Long 2 Tier Verandah with Chamfered Square Columns, 20th century 2 Tier Portico with Chinese Railings, Penciling, Reciprocating Saw Marks, Pitsaw Marks, Mortise and Tenon Joinery, Pegged, Wall of Troy Moldings, Bulkhead, 4 Panel Doors, 6/6, 6/9, 9/9, Blinds, Barred Cellar Windows, Kitchen, Corn Crib, Mill, Chapel, Barn, 3 Millstones, Cemetery, Ghost
